summary: This is a declaration by Elisa Lyons, a Legal Support Associate and Records Custodian for Equifax Information Services LLC, attesting to the authenticity of documents produced by Equifax. It was executed in September 2019 in Fulton County, Georgia, as part of a legal process, likely in response to a subpoena or discovery request related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Elisa Lyons
persons.context: She is the declarant and custodian of records for Equifax Information Services LLC, attesting to the authenticity of documents produced by the company.

events.title: Execution of Equifax Records Declaration
events.description: Elisa Lyons executes a declaration under penalty of perjury, attesting to the authenticity of Equifax records being produced.

keyFacts: Equifax Information Services LLC was involved in producing records, likely in response to a legal request related to the Epstein case.
The declaration was executed in September 2019 by Elisa Lyons, a company custodian of records.
The document certifies that the Equifax records are true and accurate copies maintained in the ordinary course of business.
The declaration is made under penalty of perjury, indicating its formal legal nature.
